general_info.summary: This text provides a glimpse into potential career opportunities and related information at Sharda University, mentioning key aspects like course fees, recruiters, COVID-19 updates, and specific campus locations in Uzbekistan and Agra. It also includes a reference to the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
